alert.note: Alert for Randolph (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 1:58PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Randolph County through 245 PM CDT... At 158 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Maynard, or 11 miles south of Doniphan, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Reyno... Maynard... Biggers... Attica... Dalton... Elkins Park... Brakebill... Middlebrook... Warm Springs... Ingram... Hamil... Stokes... Engelerg... Elm Store... Brockett... Pitman... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
